description: Comprehensive test prompts to validate all tool categories

tests.name: Create Excel from JSON
tests.prompt: Create an Excel spreadsheet from the employee data in tests/input/sample_data.json. Include all employee records with columns for ID, Name, Email, Department, Salary, and Hire Date. Format the salary column as currency.

tests.name: Create Excel from CSV with Charts
tests.prompt: Convert the sales data in tests/input/sales_data.csv to an Excel file. Add a bar chart showing total sales by region and a line chart showing daily sales trends.

tests.name: Add Conditional Formatting
tests.prompt: Create an Excel file with the employee salaries and add conditional formatting: highlight salaries above $90,000 in green and below $70,000 in red.

tests.name: Create Pivot Summary
tests.prompt: Create an Excel file from the sales data and add a pivot summary showing total sales by product and region.

tests.name: Add Formulas
tests.prompt: Create an Excel spreadsheet with the sales data and add formulas to calculate: total revenue, average unit price, and quantity sold per product.

tests.name: Create PDF Report
tests.prompt: Create a professional PDF document from the quarterly report in tests/input/report_content.txt. Use proper formatting with headers, bullet points, and a table of contents.

tests.name: Create PDF with Watermark
tests.prompt: Create a PDF from the report content and add a 'CONFIDENTIAL' diagonal watermark on every page.

tests.name: Create Protected PDF
tests.prompt: Create a PDF from the employee data and protect it with password 'secure123'. Disable printing and copying.

tests.name: JSON to PDF Table
tests.prompt: Convert the employee JSON data to a nicely formatted PDF with a table showing all employees.

tests.name: Create Multi-page PDF
tests.prompt: Create a multi-page PDF report with: Page 1 - Title and Executive Summary, Page 2 - Employee Directory table, Page 3 - Department breakdown.

tests.name: Create Word Document
tests.prompt: Create a Word document from the quarterly report content with proper headings, formatting, and a professional layout.

tests.name: Create Word with Table
tests.prompt: Create a Word document that includes the employee data as a formatted table with alternating row colors.

tests.name: Create Word with Headers/Footers
tests.prompt: Create a Word document from the report content. Add a header with 'Acme Corporation' and page numbers in the footer.

tests.name: Create Protected Word
tests.prompt: Create a Word document from the confidential report and protect it with password 'readonly123' to prevent editing.

tests.name: Mail Merge
tests.prompt: Create a mail merge template for welcome letters and merge it with the employee data to generate personalized letters.

tests.name: Create Presentation
tests.prompt: Create a PowerPoint presentation with 5 slides summarizing the quarterly report. Include a title slide, key highlights, regional performance, challenges, and recommendations.

tests.name: Create Presentation with Charts
tests.prompt: Create a PowerPoint presentation showing sales data with bar charts for regional comparison and pie charts for product distribution.

tests.name: Add Animations
tests.prompt: Create a presentation from the report content and add fade-in animations to all bullet points.

tests.name: Presentation to Images
tests.prompt: Create a presentation from the quarterly report and export each slide as a PNG image.

tests.name: Validate JSON
tests.prompt: Validate the JSON file at tests/input/sample_data.json and report any structural issues.

tests.name: Repair Invalid JSON
tests.prompt: Repair the invalid JSON file at tests/input/invalid_json.json and save the corrected version.

tests.name: Transform JSON
tests.prompt: Transform the employee data JSON to extract only Engineering department employees and output as a new JSON file.

tests.name: JSON to PDF
tests.prompt: Convert the employee JSON data to a formatted PDF document with a table.

tests.name: Sign JSON
tests.prompt: Generate signing keys and digitally sign the employee data JSON file.

tests.name: Excel to PDF
tests.prompt: Create an Excel file from the sales data and convert it to PDF format.

tests.name: Word to PDF
tests.prompt: Create a Word document from the report and convert it to PDF.

tests.name: CSV to JSON
tests.prompt: Convert the sales CSV file to JSON format.

tests.name: JSON to CSV
tests.prompt: Extract the employees array from the JSON data and convert it to CSV format.

tests.name: JSON to YAML
tests.prompt: Convert the employee data JSON to YAML format.

tests.name: Word Count
tests.prompt: Count the words, lines, and characters in the quarterly report text file.

tests.name: Find and Replace
tests.prompt: In the report content, replace all occurrences of 'Widget' with 'Product' and save to a new file.

tests.name: Extract Lines
tests.prompt: Extract all lines containing 'Revenue' or 'revenue' from the report.

tests.name: Text to JSON
tests.prompt: Parse the quarterly report text and convert it to a structured JSON with sections for summary, highlights, challenges, and recommendations.

tests.name: Add Text Watermark
tests.prompt: Add a 'SAMPLE' text watermark to any generated image.

tests.name: Redact Sensitive Info
tests.prompt: Create an image with sample text and redact any email addresses found.

tests.name: Complete Report Package
tests.prompt: Create a complete report package: 1) Word document with the quarterly report, 2) Excel spreadsheet with sales data and charts, 3) PDF version of the Word doc with watermark, 4) PowerPoint summary presentation.

tests.name: Data Processing Pipeline
tests.prompt: Process the employee data: 1) Validate the JSON, 2) Transform to extract only high-salary employees (>$80k), 3) Create an Excel file with the filtered data, 4) Add conditional formatting to highlight the highest paid, 5) Convert to PDF.

tests.name: Sales Analysis Package
tests.prompt: Analyze sales data: 1) Convert CSV to JSON, 2) Create Excel with pivot table by region and product, 3) Add bar chart for regional comparison, 4) Create PDF report, 5) Create 3-slide PowerPoint with key insights.

tests.name: Secure Document Package
tests.prompt: Create a secure document package: 1) Create Word document from report, 2) Add headers/footers with confidential markings, 3) Convert to PDF, 4) Add watermark, 5) Password protect the PDF.
